website_summaries.verdict: A unique, compact heater for rapidly heating your living space. Provides maximum comfort in a small package.
pros: Streamlined aesthetic is paired with a positive temperature coefficient ceramic heating element for fast results
Shuts off immediately if it happens to tip over
There's an option to have the fan oscillate and the heater runs fairly quietly (no louder than 45 decibels)
It's lightweight, so it's easy to move from room to room
cons: Single setting offers no option for low heat or cooling fan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This heater works very well. The heat flow is pretty steady. Its footprint is small enough to move around the home. The only problem I've had with it is that when placed on soft carpet, the failsafe switch doesn't get activated leaving the heater not on. So we usually use it on a table. Overall it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Super cool looking heater with great functionality!
customer_reviews.text: This heater has a super cool, futuristic look to it. And on top of that...it is very straightforward and easy to use. Flip the switch on the back to turn the heater on and press the button on the front to start the oscillating! The auto shut-off is pretty sensitive. If it tilts even a little, it will shut off, making this safe to use inside. Overall, this is one of my favorite heaters that I have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Malone

customer_reviews.title: Small and as powerful as you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This heater's best feature is its look. It is sleek and modern and very quiet. It is about as powerful as you'd expect a heater of this size to be. The oscillation is a nice feature and the automatic off is very responsive. It can struggle on carpet if it is thicker. Overall a good heater for a desk or small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: clean look.
customer_reviews.text: only two buttons. a switch an oscillating mode. That's it. easy to use and low powered slick looking heater. also equipped with self killing mode when tipped over. not a bad device for an office use where they constantly run AC even in winter. I'm talking about my office and this might come in handy since it only uses 500w. I'm certain that this won't trip the breaker on my work desk.
customer_reviews.author: Toejam

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small office
customer_reviews.text: I use this is my small office and it works well for what it does. One thing to note is that it only has one settings, so if you want a heater that has different heat levels or fan levels then this doesn't have that, but if you just want a simple heater for a small room then it works well. There are only 2 buttons. 1 Button for power and 1 button for oscillation. Only having 2 buttons gives it a nice minimalist style. It works perfect for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Personal space perfection
customer_reviews.text: This little heater makes my workspace so much cozier in the winter months. It looks sleek and modern, and the safety feature makes me confident I'm not going to start any fires with it. Looks great and works very well, too!
customer_reviews.author: D. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the heater. It can go on a desk or tabletop. It also oscillates back and forth to cover a wider area. It can also be used as an under desk heater. It's small enough to be easily transported as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Prewett

customer_reviews.title: Modern design
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute and modern small heater, but only good for a small space instead of an entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Hsu-Hua,Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great small portable space heater
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this one and other one I have. Both are amazing. You need to keep in mind these are mini space heaters so don't expect it to heat up a large room! Meant for small rooms such as a bedroom or bathroom. But works great!
customer_reviews.author: rhcp011235

customer_reviews.title: Heater Review
customer_reviews.text: As this is an infrared space heater, you can be sure that you’ll get the full benefit from the infrared waves rather than the heat being lost to the air in the room. If you sit in the front of this heater, it will gently emit infrared waves to warm you up, like the rays of the sun on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Such a great little heater
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but this little thing is great. Super simple design (love the way it looks), very small, quiet, and surprisingly puts out a good amount of heat. Even has a sensor so if it falls over it turns off. I would highly recommend anyone who needs a small heater for their office or home.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh

customer_reviews.title: do not get this heater
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if i got a lemon but this heater stopped working after a few weeks. If this is want this product is like i do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tufts

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It‘s soooo cute!I bought this heater for coming winter. I tested it at home,it worked great for my small room .This little heater exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small area
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bedroom which tends to be cooler than the rest of the rooms. It is quiet and works well. I like that it us small and it turns off as soon as it is moved.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Small, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this heater for about two weeks. This works great for heating up your personal space, but also heats up my home office. This uses less power than most heaters and seems quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: good item when you living in the North
customer_reviews.text: This heater is really helpful when temperature goes down.... Because I am from the South, so when temperature drop, northern feel good, but not for me. hopefully, I have this heater with me.
customer_reviews.author: CHIAANLIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for cold times
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and warm up whole room sick and whole device is cold, it spins around and have safety switch. High recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: my original heater not very hot for my room so i used this small heater than get my room hotter good thx
customer_reviews.author: goodmoring11

customer_reviews.title: Great heater with safety and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable heater. I have been using this for over a week at my desk and have not been disappointed. The unit heats up near instantly and the rotation is very quiet (unlike some of the units that squeak). It is also a safe unit. All of the wiring matches what I would expect in a unit bought from a local store, and it has safety features like tip detection (small switch on the bottom). Time will tell how long this unit lasts, but I am confident it will keep me warm going into this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Simon S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Nothing to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Small little heater. Won't heat up a room but maybe in your office to keep your feet warm under your desk or on your desk to keep your hands warm. It's a personal heater. Does produce some decent heat but it won't blow you away either. Just a little computer fan in the back. Features a tip over switch so if it gets knocked over it will shut off. Features 2 switches. The main on/off switch on the back that turns the unit on then the button on the front to control the back and forth movement. Very simple operation. For it's intended purpose it will work fine but don't expect it to heat up a whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Noell

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than I thought, but still works after months!
customer_reviews.text: So after 6 months, it occasionally makes this fan rubbing noise, not all the time but enough to be annoyed at first but once it gets warmed up it normalizes. Now I am not sure if my gf dropped it and that's why it only sometimes sounds like that, but she claims she didn't but she still uses it everyday in her cold apartment for her bathroom (which doesn't have a heating vent) and her bed side, because it's easier to get to and less wattage being used
customer_reviews.author: iBertz

customer_reviews.title: Small Heater with Great output!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this heater in the office to take the chill off the floor while I do my live stream videos. The heater doesn't work well (or at all) on carpet. I literally have put a clip board down on the floor to trigger the tip over protection switch (see the video) and it works very well! The heater really puts out a lot of heat! It is almost too much for under the desk, but the oscillating helps to move the heat around and keep me from overheating! :)
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Handyman John Young

customer_reviews.title: it does a wonderful job to heat my small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: but one thing I noticed is that it is VERY light, and pulling the slightest but on the cord can tip it over. I put the cord out of the way, so it does not disturb me, but I am aware of it and am careful about it. Otherwise, it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamine

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a back up heater and I really like it
customer_reviews.text: It is easily able to heat my bedroom. I also really like that it is small and easy to place on my nightstand. One thing, like the other heater I bought, that I would wish this had was a self timer button where I can program it to turn on and off during different times.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Shahin

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and put out good heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small heater use for local heating at a workstation or when you're watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: CraigShipp.com

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful personal heater
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful personal heater I have ever seen! I use this in my 10x10x8 bedroom and it works fantastic--let it heat for a good 20-30 mins and you've got the hottest room in the house! The beautiful, white ceramic makes it stand out, yet look professional. Great space heater!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: The turning of the blower on such a compact unit is pretty neat. It also has a safety switch at the bottom to turn off the device in case it's not upright. Great safety feature...
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work at my station. The unit I work on gets cold at night. This little heater packs a punch and knocks the chill out at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS NICELY
customer_reviews.text: I have this on a table top near me and it delivers a perfect amount to heat, even a whole room
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bathroom warm and comfy !
customer_reviews.text: Old man winter has a firm grip here and stepping out of the shower is the worst ! This little cutie does a wonderful job keeping me warm. It's just the right size for the bathroom and I love the way it goes 'back-and-forth' spreading the heat around.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W.

product_meta.title: 500W Personal Space Heater Portable PTC Heater Mini Space Electric Heater Oscillating Safety Tip-over Shutoff Protection Overheat Protection Quick Heating Noiseless Heater for Office Desktop Home
feature_bullets: Quick Heating: PTC(Positive Temperature Coefficient) self-regulating heating element produces high heating power that quickly heats up the room and regulates the temperature itself; higher efficiency, durability & safety

Advanced Protection: Tip-over safety switch and overheat protection will automatically turn the unit off in the event of it being knocked on its side or overheated. Thermal fuse for extra safety if the overheat protection failed
Wider Angle & Low Noise: 60 degree oscillation provides wider airflow distribution with noise lower than 45db, which ensure your optimal comfort without being interfered by annoying sound

Portability & Simplicity: Small and light-weight design makes it easy to use or relocate; the white and sleek look goes well with rooms in any color and designs, reflecting a modern style and good taste

Wide Applications: Made of flame resistant material for worry-free use; perfect for personal offices, home, bedroom, desktop or dormitory. Its elegant look makes it a perfect gift for your family or friends. Note: this heater doesn't have thermostat or other heat settings; only ON/OFF status.
